name: Spacelinks
description:
Made for GMTK GAME JAM 2021 in 48h

Pilot the tiny space station, join and disconnect modules on the way, construct unbelievable spaceships, explore the debris field to rescue the remaining humans!

Open the orbital gates and join with the humanity's greatest treasure...

Spacelinks is physics-based spaceship simulator, where everything is build from small modules that you can attach and detach to you at will.

Adrian Galeazzi https://twitter.com/SatolasGames / design, programming, graphics
Mikołaj Bazaczek https://twitter.com/aerloth / design, programming, graphics
Dreat https://twitter.com/dreat_ / music, sfx
